actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a maximum individual income tax rate of 50 percent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require a maximum individual income tax rate of 50 percent. Provides for the phasing-in of such 50 percent rate by five percent decrements over four years, beginning with 65 percent in 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a maximum individual income tax rate of 50 percent.
